name: Lineal
description:
When you work in partnership with Lineal you can expect to receive flawless end-to-end solutions to meet your legal support needs. Harnessing leading-edge technologies with unrivalled in-house expertise and experience, we work efficiently and intelligently to achieve best-in-class results.
And because we understand the unique demands of your profession, when your plans change, you can rely on us to work with round-the-clock dedication to meet your deadlines in a rigorous and timely manner.
Our teams have the talent, knowledge, and technology required to support your organisation in all challenges related to digital forensics, cyber security, and eDiscovery. All three of these areas are experiencing rapid change and we are alive to the latest in best practice. This provides confidence to our clients as by investing in our services, we will help them manage risk, meet their compliance requirements, and work within their time-frames and budgets.
